DOC.detailed_description: In 1st stage ( Week 1-12 ) , patient receive combination chemotherapy , i.e . Platinum Navelbine , 4 cycle . The regimen : Navelbine oral 60mg/m2 d1,8 first cycle ; oral 80mg/m2 day1,8 sequential cycle q3w plus cisplatin : 75mg/m2 d1 q3w . In 2nd stage ( Week 13-25 ) , patient complete combination chemotherapy acceptable tolerance PD allocate 2 arm , evaluate efficacy safety maintenance chemotherapy metronomic oral Navelbine ( Arm A ) regimen ( Arm B ) .
